job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_details.full_text:
AI Software Engineer, IgniteTech (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and deployment of applications built on large language models (LLMs) and state-of-the-art AI technologies like GPT-4 Vision. Core responsibilities include creating autonomous support platforms, integrating AI, and enhancing AI solutions across infrastructures, aligning directly with the definition and responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and refinement of models, specifically Large Language Models (LLMs), for a specific application.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision
job_tasks.justification: This involves evaluating and incorporating advanced AI models, which falls under the modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of a user-facing application or feature powered by AI.

job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating AI technologies into existing workflows and supporting users, which is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets
job_tasks.justification: This describes the ongoing maintenance, updates, and issue resolution for deployed AI tools, which are core MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS
job_tasks.justification: This involves assessing and improving the operational performance and deployment of AI solutions within a specific cloud infrastructure, aligning with MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction
job_tasks.justification: This relates to the operational support and maintenance of AI systems to ensure user satisfaction and service quality.

job_tasks.phrase: significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the impact of the AI work on business objectives like innovation and service quality, indicating an understanding of business goals.

soft_skills.phrase: troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets
